title: chambre studio  dans cour très recherché
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


rent independent studio room with locals, fully equipped, located on the 1st floor, quiet in a flowered courtyard, rare and very sought after in Paris, close to public transport (2 minutes walk), bus and metro Belleville .
looking for a discreet and respectful tenant.
the rental price is 890 euros per month + allow 40 euros of charges per month.
are looking for a calm and respectful tenant



available from April 12.
no parties allowed.
No apl. 
animals are not allowed.
do not smoke inside.
